title: Stuck on checking for updates
content: I have been sent a replacement due to an issue with my previous phone. Now the replacement phone is stuck on “Checking for updates” as I’m trying to set it up. Have tried restarting, using various wifi networks as well as my mobile network. Still will not progress and there’s no way to go through without being connected to a network.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
